$$
ck \equiv key^e \mod n
$$



因为key不是素数，所以key可以拆为两个数相乘


$$
ck \equiv (a\times b)^e \mod n
$$


这就可以用中间相遇攻击了


$$
ck \equiv a^{e}\times b^e \mod n
$$




$$
ck \times b^{-e} \equiv a^e \mod n
$$



```py
# python3.11.4
from Crypto.Util.number import *
from tqdm import trange
from hashlib import md5

n = 
e = 65537
ck = 

dic = {}
# 17bit
for a in trange(2^16,2^17):
    dic[pow(a,e,n)] = a
    
# 20bit
for b in trange(2^19,2^20):
    tmp = ck * inverse(pow(b,e,n),n) % n
    if tmp in dic.keys():
        a = dic[tmp]
        KEY = a*b
        flag = b'NSSCTF{' + md5(str(KEY).encode()).hexdigest().encode() + b'}'
        print(KEY)
        print(flag)
        break
        # 62495925932
        # NSSCTF{14369380f677abec84ed8b6d0e3a0ba9}
```
